name: Insect, Scorpion
description: A tiny beast with a natural armor that provides low defense and a piercing sting as its primary means of attack.
memorable: Its sting can deliver both piercing and additional poison damage, making it a potential threat to weaker opponents.
goals: To ambush unsuspecting prey using stealth tactics.
relations: Typically found in environments shared with other small predators.
environment: Commonly found in arid or rocky regions.
strengths: Capable of stealth with a moderate Stealth score, allowing it to ambush its targets effectively.
weaknesses: Very low hit points and inadequate physical attributes render it fragile in combat.
attacks: Sting attack with a reach of 5 feet that can deal piercing damage and potentially poison the target.
most_powerful_ability: Sting attack that may inflict additional poison damage if the target fails a saving throw.
senses: Possesses keensight within a range of 10 feet, relying more on senses than sight.
skills: Moderate proficiency in Stealth allows it to move quietly and catch prey off guard.
additional_information: Very low Constitution and Strength scores limit its resilience and power.
Overall serves as a minor threat in combat scenarios.
Can be a nuisance more than a true danger to stronger foes.
Strikes with its sting and can ambush effectively in low visibility.
Relies on stealth tactics to survive rather than direct confrontations.

small insect that can poison its prey

scorpion with natural armor and stealth
